landpks_portal_form.note_value:
Please update your applications to the latest version so that edited data will be visible in on your phone.
The latest version of LandPKS apps can be downloaded from Google Play Store and iTunes

landinfo_common.name: Plot Name
landinfo_common.surface_cracking: Vertical cracks when dry at least 5mm wide and 25cm deep
landinfo_common.surface_cracking_part_1: Vertical cracks when dry at least
landinfo_common.surface_cracking_en: Vertical cracks when dry at least 1/4 in wide and 10 in deep
landinfo_common.surface_cracking_en_part_1: Vertical cracks when dry at least

question1.text: Does the soil form a ball

question2.text: Does the soil form a ribbon

landinfo_app.no_surface_cracking: No vertical cracks when dry at least 5mm wide and 25cm deep
landinfo_app.no_surface_cracking_en: No vertical cracks when dry at least 1/4 in wide and 10 in deep
landinfo_app.plot_delele_on_clouds_message: Do you wish to remove all LandInfo data and LandCover data for this plot from this device ?
landinfo_app.plot_delele_on_device_message: All LandInfo and LandCover data will be deleted from the phone. This cannot be undone. Do you wish to continue?
landinfo_app.review_plot_mess_top: Plot data can be viewed and edited at
landinfo_app.linfo_confirm_submit_message_testplot:
You have indicated that this is a practice plot. Your data will not be available for download and cannot be edited on the Data Portal. Plot information will be deleted after 30 days.

Do you wish to continue?
landinfo_app.linfo_confirm_submit_message_non_testplo:
Confirm submit. Submitted data may become publicly available. After submitting data, data can only be edited by the user on the Data Portal (portal.landpotential.org).

Do you wish to continue?
landinfo_app.lcover_notification_cannotsubmit_notenou: No transect data has been entered. Plot cannot be submitted. Please enter data to submit plot.
landinfo_app.take_photo_error_message_on_web_app: The Camera function is unavailable on the web version.

landinfo_portal_form.search_plot_delete_placeholder: Select or search plots to remove
landinfo_portal_form.message_dialog_success_note_value: To see the changes on your mobile device, please logout and login on the device.
landinfo_portal_form.slope_meter_message: This is Slope Meter Reading - Available Only on Mobile App
photo_notes: 2. Maximum image size is 5MB. Plot upload time will vary depending on image size.
landinfo_portal_form.update_plot_submit_dialog_header: Are you sure you want to update?
landinfo_portal_form.update_plot_submit_dialog_body: The values for the plot: [X] will be permanently updated with the new values.
landinfo_portal_form.new_plot_submit_dialog_header: Are you sure you want to add new plot?
landinfo_portal_form.new_plot_submit_dialog_body: New plot: [X] will be permanently added to the database.
landinfo_portal_form.form_error_warning: Please correct all errors before submission.
landinfo_portal_form.delete_plot_dialog_header: Are you sure you want to remove?
landinfo_portal_form.delete_plot_dialog_body: This action will remove selected plots from the database. Please select yes if you want to remove selected plots.
landinfo_portal_form.delete_no_plots_selected_warning: Please select at least one plot to remove.
landinfo_portal_form.delete_plot_last_warning_body: If you remove selected plots these plot will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered. Select yes to confirm removal.
landinfo_portal_form.location_error_message: Could not find location. Please enter manually
landinfo_portal_form.plot_already_exist: This plot already exists in the system. Please try another plotname.
landinfo_portal_form.error_uploading_photos: Form couldn't be updated because there was error uploading photos. Please try again later!!

landcover_portal_form.message_dialog_success_note_value: To see the changes on your mobile device, please logout and login on the device.
landcover_portal_form.missing_segments_validation_message: [X] segments have not been completed, calculation will be displayed when all segments have been completed.
landcover_portal_form.ready_segments_message:
Segments [X] are ready for submission.
Do you want to submit them?
landcover_portal_form.update_landcover_dialog_body: Landcover data for plot: [X] will be permanently updated.
landcover_portal_form.new_landcover_dialog_body: Landcover data for plot: [X] will be permanently added to the database.
landcover_portal_form.delete_landcover_dialog_header: Are you sure you want to remove?
landcover_portal_form.delete_landcover_body_one_date: This action will remove landcover data for plot: [X] for date: [Y] from database. Please select yes if you want to remove this plot.
landcover_portal_form.delete_landcover_body_all_date: This action will remove landcover data for plot: [X] from database. Please select yes if you want to remove this plot.
landcover_portal_form.delete_landcover_last_warning_body: If you remove this landcover data. It will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered. Select yes to confirm removal.
landcover_portal_form.delete_landcover_one_date_success: Successfully removed landcover for plot: [X] for date: [Y]
landcover_portal_form.date_already_exists_error: Date already exists.Please pick another date.
landcover_portal_form.update_landcover_success: Successfully updated landcover data for plot: [X]
landcover_portal_form.insert_landcover_success: Successfully inserted landcover data for plot: [X]
